mapper.select:
select shpm.ht_product_model_id, shpm.product_model_id,shpm.product_model_code, shpm.product_model_name, shpm.product_model_desc, shpm.product_family_id, bpf.product_family_code, bpf.product_family_name, bpf.product_family_desc, shpm.status, shpm.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,shpm.create_time, shpm.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName,shpm.modified_time, shpm.organization_id, shpm.remark, bo.organization_name from fantech_imes.smt_ht_product_model shpm left join ocean.sys_user u on shpm.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on shpm.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.base_product_family bpf on shpm.product_family_id = bpf.product_family_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON shpm.organization_id = bo.organization_id
1=1
and date_format(shpm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shpm.product_model_code like CONCAT('%', #{productModelCode}, '%')
and shpm.product_model_desc like CONCAT('%', #{productModelDesc}, '%')
order by shpm.modified_time desc
